description.mobile: I'm a full-stack web developer and founder of Abril Codes. I turn ideas into exceptional digital experiences. Need a professional website, custom software, or an innovative solution? Let's chat!

paragraphs: I'm David Abril, a professional developer with an 8.75/10 GPA in Computer Engineering. My journey began at MindFactory, where I developed core skills before venturing out to create Abril Codes, blending creativity and technology into unique digital solutions.

At Abril Codes, I collaborate with a talented team: Valentina Correa (graphic designer) and Francisco Ameri (software engineer and project manager). Together, we create solutions that balance cutting-edge technology with thoughtful design. I'm particularly proud of our approach that values both technical excellence and the human element in every project we undertake.

I firmly believe in the value that academic knowledge brings to software development. When building my team, I prioritize individuals with strong educational backgrounds, as university education provides a solid foundation of theoretical principles and problem-solving methodologies that are essential for creating sophisticated, well-documented solutions that stand the test of time.
About.aiBody: My approach to AI in development is pragmatic: it should enhance human creativity, not replace it. While AI can handle syntax and implementation details, developers must retain deep understanding of fundamentals. I don't believe in memorizing what AI can generate with a simple prompt—instead, I invest my energy in mastering core concepts and problem-solving skills that allow me to effectively direct AI tools while maintaining complete control over architecture and quality.

design.title: Custom Design
design.description: We create unique, tailored designs that reflect your brand identity and engage your audience effectively across all devices.

design.bottomRightDescription: A personalized design approach ensures your digital presence stands out from competitors, creating memorable experiences that resonate with your target audience and reinforce your brand's unique positioning.

support.title: Support & Maintenance
support.description: We provide ongoing technical support and regular updates to ensure your website remains secure, fast, and aligned with your evolving business needs.
support.fullDescription: Our relationship doesn't end at launch. We provide ongoing maintenance to keep your website secure, up-to-date, and performing optimally.
